main event: On July 29, 1962, a silvery elliptical object was observed hovering over a wooded area north of Meriden, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and silvery grey, about 50 feet in diameter.,The object hovered for about 5 minutes before moving rapidly to the north.,The sighting was witnessed by two reliable observers, both USAF officers.,Initial assumption was that the object was a weather balloon, but its characteristics suggested otherwise.,There was no sound associated with the sighting.
